= Upgrade

[cols="2,3,5a"]
|===
|Type|Default value|Description
3+| *UPGRADE_DEBUG*
|`bool`
|false|Enable/disable debug logging.
To enable debug logging set `UPGRADE_DEBUG=true`.

3+| *UPGRADE_ALWAYS*
|`bool`
|true|Controls if the upgradable systems should
be upgraded when the server starts.
